page.title: 09Fruit Farmers Interview cont
page.content: fruit and cooking apples for the wholesale market in Bristol. Cider fruit under contract to Bulmer's. {What effect has membership of the {EEC had?}In the early years it had an adverse effect,but now English apples are competitive with the French 'Golden Delicious'.I believe the entry of Spain and Portugal will again have an adverse effect. { Does the range of fruit grown {provide {protection against bad weather or {pests?}There is no answer to bad weather,but any damage to the fruit by pests would be my fault.Modern pesticides have certainly improved the quality of the crop.The farm is about 100 acres_70 fruit 30 grass.Trees are replaced every 20-30 years.Output from the farm varies between 300 and 900 30lb boxes per acre.
